label: Week 1 - Feb 17th to 23rd
release_notes:
• **Bug fixes** to resolve various reported issues and improve overall stability.
• **Performance enhancements** to ensure a smoother and more reliable experience.
• **General improvements** to optimize system responsiveness.

label: Daily Update - Feb 23rd
release_notes:
• Introduced a completely redesigned **Professor Dashboard**, featuring a retractable sidebar and customizable, draggable cards for a personalized workspace.
• Launched a new **AI Question Generator** that allows you to instantly create exam questions by simply submitting text or uploading files.
• Added an **AI Polish** tool to the editor, enabling you to automatically refine question wording and improve grading rubrics with a single click.
• Enhanced the **Exam Creation Flow** with a comprehensive step-by-step process for setting details, managing questions, and reviewing content before publishing.
• Upgraded the **Question Editor** with full Markdown support, rich text formatting, and improved handling for both multiple-choice and open-ended answers.
• Refreshed the **Login** experience with a modern interface and smoother entry process.
• Implemented various **Backend Improvements** to ensure faster data loading and increased platform stability.

label: Daily Update - Feb 24th
release_notes:
• **Create Exam Experience:** Streamlined the exam creation workflow with a simplified interface and resolved issues where previous session data would persist when starting a new exam.
• **Dashboard Enhancements:** Restored the dark theme and re-enabled draggable cards, giving you more control over your workspace layout.
• **AI Generation:** Resolved an issue with the **Generate with AI** feature to ensure reliable and consistent question creation.
• **Scheduling Tools:** improved the Time Picker component for easier input and fixed errors that occurred when saving exams with empty time fields.
• **Course Management:** Fixed a bug where course names were not displaying correctly in the dashboard table and improved the reliability of deleting questions from the UI.
• **Performance:** Includes general backend improvements and stability fixes to ensure smoother data saving and loading.

label: Daily Update - Feb 25th
release_notes:
• **Student Dashboard:** Introduced a dedicated view for students to easily access and track their assigned exams.
• **Exam Creation:** Refined the design with a new Dark Mode, smart date pre-filling, and a more responsive layout for a smoother experience.
• **Course Management:** Professors can now quickly import student lists via CSV and manage course rosters with improved tools.
• **Enhanced Question Editor:** Updated the interface with a cleaner split-view layout for previewing questions and improved AI generation reliability.
• **Time Picker:** Redesigned the time selection tool for better accuracy and ease of use.
• **Sign Up & Login:** Streamlined the account creation process with clearer role selection and improved sidebar navigation.
• **Performance & Stability:** Includes general bug fixes and backend improvements to ensure a faster, more reliable experience.

label: Daily Update - Feb 26th
release_notes:
• **Student Dashboard:** Students can now seamlessly view and access exams as soon as they are published by professors.
• **Exam Creation:** Updated the professor workflow to make adding courses, questions, and reviewing exam details more intuitive and reliable.
• **Login improvements:** Resolved an issue to ensure users are always directed to the correct dashboard based on their role immediately after logging in.
• **Profile accuracy:** Fixed bugs causing incorrect user information or email addresses to appear on the student dashboard.
• **Performance and Stability:** Implemented various backend improvements to enhance data loading speeds and prevent errors during exam retrieval.

label: Daily Update - Feb 27th
release_notes:
• **Exam Review UI:** Enhanced the visual presentation of the exam review screen, making it easier to view grading rubrics for long-answer questions and correct answers for multiple-choice sections.
• **Course Management:** Streamlined the course creation process with a new, detailed interface for setting up course information.
• **Dashboard Reliability:** Resolved data loading issues to ensure the Professor Dashboard displays accurate profile and course information immediately upon login.
• **Account Access:** Fixed bugs affecting the signup and profile creation process to ensure a smoother onboarding experience for new users.
• **Performance:** Includes general stability improvements and backend optimizations to make the platform faster and more reliable.

label: Daily Update - Feb 28th
release_notes:
• **Enhanced Question Editor:** Experience a refreshed interface with card-based layouts, improved contrast, and a vibrant new color scheme for better readability.
• **New Student Dashboard:** Students can now easily track upcoming and completed exams via a dedicated dashboard and a streamlined exam-taking interface with Markdown support.
• **Improved Exam Creation:** Redesigned the "Add Questions" and "Exam Details" screens for a more consistent and intuitive workflow, including better rubric alignment.
• **Course Management:** Resolved issues with student association during the course creation process to ensure rosters are accurate.
• **Performance & Stability:** Implemented significant backend improvements to ensure reliable exam saving, publishing, and data synchronization.

label: Daily Update - Mar 1st
release_notes:
• **Exam Integrity:** Resolved issues with saving and retrieving exam data to ensure rubrics and answer choices are always preserved correctly.
• **Editing Experience:** Fixed a bug where exam details might not load fully when entering the edit screen, ensuring a smoother workflow for instructors.
• **Enhanced Notifications:** Status messages are now clearer and consolidated to provide better feedback when saving or publishing exams.
• **Student Dashboard:** Resolved a loading issue to ensure students can access their dashboard and exams without interruption.
• **Performance:** General backend improvements and optimizations for a faster, more stable experience.

label: Daily Update - Mar 2nd
release_notes:
• **Enhanced Student Dashboard:** Redesigned the dashboard with visually improved exam cards and clearer navigation for starting exams or viewing past submissions.

• **Improved Exam Experience:** Added a detailed summary screen with instructions and AI monitoring information before exams begin, plus reliable progress saving to resume interrupted sessions.

• **Submission Review:** Introduced a comprehensive "View Submission" screen, allowing students to easily review their answers, rubrics, and exam details after completion.

• **Professor Dashboard Updates:** Upgraded the exams table to include a "Grade" action for pending exams and a new column tracking completed versus total submissions.

• **Search Functionality:** Added local search capabilities within exam reviews to help users locate specific questions quickly.

• **Visual Refresh:** Refined the overall application design with updated styling, smoother hover effects, and a more modern color theme.

• **Performance & Stability:** Implemented significant backend improvements to ensure faster data loading and smoother exam transitions.

label: Daily Update - Mar 3rd
release_notes:
• **Advanced Exam Analytics:** Professors can now access a comprehensive insights portal featuring score distributions, question difficulty analysis, and a visual leaderboard for student performance.

• **Enhanced Student Feedback:** Students can now view detailed grade breakdowns, question-specific feedback, and visual score charts immediately after grading is complete.

• **Improved Grade Management:** Introduced a dedicated grading screen for professors, including the ability to view individual student details and re-grade exams with a single click.

• **Redesigned Login Experience:** A refreshed, modern authentication interface featuring new animations, improved accessibility, and an enhanced visual theme.

• **Streamlined Dashboard:** Updated the student dashboard to clearly distinguish between upcoming assignments, in-progress exams, and graded submissions.

• **Performance and Stability:** Implemented backend optimizations to ensure faster data loading, smoother exam submissions, and improved security.

label: Daily Update - Mar 4th
release_notes:
• **Enhanced Print & PDF Export:** Completely redesigned the exam printing experience with improved layout, smarter page utilization, and automatic course naming for PDF files. The page flip animation is now smoother and more visually appealing.

• **Smart QR Codes:** Exams now feature dynamically generated QR codes that automatically embed essential student and exam details to streamline the grading process.

• **Streamlined Onboarding:** A redesigned signup flow and improved role selection screen ensure a smoother start for new users. Added a dedicated user profile section to the sidebar for quick access to account details.

• **Subscription Management:** Introduced a new pricing interface and a dynamic billing section in the dashboard, allowing professors to easily manage memberships and view subscription status.

• **User Settings:** New dedicated settings pages for both students and professors allow for easier management of profile information and application preferences.

• **Improved Exam Creation:** Enhanced the stability of generating exams from uploaded images and PDFs, specifically optimizing the handling of larger files to prevent errors.

• **Performance & Stability:** Resolved various authentication redirect loops, loading state issues, and backend errors to provide a faster, more reliable experience.

label: Daily Update - Mar 5th
release_notes:
• **Grading updates**: Refined the core exam grading logic for better consistency and processing.
• **System stability**: Enhanced system infrastructure to ensure reliable access and performance.
• **General fixes**: Includes under-the-hood optimizations to keep the platform running smoothly.

label: Daily Update - Mar 6th
release_notes:
• **Professor Dashboard:** Experience a redesigned layout with improved exam tables, enhanced stats card styling, and new time-range filters for the Question Analytics chart.
• **Paper Exams:** Introduced a streamlined workflow for generating and grading paper-based exams, featuring accurate letter-size previews and improved PDF rendering for multiple-choice questions.
• **Submission Review:** Enhanced the student submission view to display comprehensive grading data, feedback, and exam results directly within the review window.
• **User Interface:** Improved responsiveness when creating courses and interacting with dialogs, resolving issues where elements occasionally became unclickable.
• **Stability:** Includes general performance improvements and backend optimizations to ensure smoother navigation and reliable exam assignments.

label: Daily Update - Mar 7th
release_notes:
• Introduced a **Smart Print Layout** engine that dynamically adjusts question spacing and automatically moves content between pages to ensure perfectly formatted paper exams.
• Enhanced the **Exam Editor** with improved text persistence, refined multiple-choice alignment, and cleaner question numbering to ensure your content looks exactly as intended.
• Added a new **Usage Dashboard** that allows professors to track AI generation limits, view grading credits, and analyze usage history through interactive charts.
• Streamlined the **Grading Workflow** with new visual indicators that pulse green when student submissions are completed and ready for review.
• Improved **PDF Processing** capabilities to support bulk generation, allowing you to download exam materials for all students in a single action.
• Refined the **Dashboard Interface** with a modernized profile section, cleaner submission displays, and horizontal scrolling support for data-rich exam tables.
• Implemented various **Performance Improvements** and backend optimizations to ensure faster exam saving and smoother navigation.

label: Daily Update - Mar 8th
release_notes:
• Enhanced the exam interface with improved visual contrast for question boxes and clearer outlines.
• Upgraded **Paper Exam Mode** with higher resolution image generation for sharper QR codes and a new progress tracker during uploads.
• Improved **AI Grading** accuracy and reliability for both text and image-based submissions, ensuring feedback is correctly recorded for all eligible students.
• Added **Accessibility** improvements for screen reader users when navigating dialog windows.
• Updated the date picker for a smoother scheduling experience.
• Includes general performance improvements and backend bug fixes to ensure smoother operation.

label: Daily Update - Mar 9th
release_notes:
• **Exam Preview Mode:** Professors can now preview exams exactly as a student would see them directly from the dashboard or review screen, ensuring content looks perfect before publishing.
• **Enhanced Analytics:** Updated usage and question charts feature a refined visual design and new time range options, including 1-month and 1-year views.
• **Paper Exam Grading:** The grading interface has been redesigned for a more compact experience, featuring faster upload processing and clearer progress indicators.
• **Smart Question Editor:** Enhanced the question creation tools with new AI polishing features and improved support for image uploads.
• **Timezone Accuracy:** Exam timers, start dates, and deadlines now automatically adjust to display in the user’s local time zone.
• **Unified Interface:** The multiple-choice display in the professor's grading view now visually matches the student's submission view for a consistent experience.
• **Billing & Subscription:** Refreshed the settings interface to clearly display current plan details, available features, and subscription management options.
• **General Improvements:** Includes various performance optimizations and stability fixes for smoother exam submissions.

label: Week 2 - Mar 10th to 16th
release_notes:
• **Support Chat Enhancements**: Added support chat to the landing page and refined visibility to ensure it appears only on relevant professor and login screens.
• **Email Generation**: Improved performance when processing large contact lists and added flexibility to use any column from uploaded CSV files for personalization.
• **Interface Polish**: Enhanced readability for notification messages on dark backgrounds and added rich text formatting support to chat responses.
• **General Improvements**: Includes backend optimizations and stability fixes to ensure a smoother experience.

label: Daily Update - Mar 10th
release_notes:

• **Enhanced Question Editor:** Refined the editing layout for better focus, improved image upload previews, and introduced the new "Perfection" polishing tool.

• **Student Experience:** Exams now clearly display Course Names rather than IDs, along with improved filtering for active and upcoming assessments.

label: Daily Update - Mar 11th
release_notes:

label: Daily Update - Mar 12th
release_notes:

• **Performance:** Includes stability improvements, better camera connectivity, and general bug fixes for a smoother experience.

label: Daily Update - Mar 13th
release_notes:

• **Academic Integrity Timeline**: Instructors can now view a detailed history of exam violations in a new chronological timeline view, including camera snapshots and specific incident logs.
• **Grades Dashboard Updates**: Added a dedicated status indicator in the Grades table to easily identify and review students with flagged academic integrity violations.
• **Refined Exam Interface**: The exam layout has been updated to display content and history side-by-side, improving visibility and ease of use during monitoring.
• **Performance & Stability**: Resolved authentication loading issues and improved page routing logic for a smoother, faster login experience.
• **Backend Improvements**: Includes general database optimizations and asset loading fixes to enhance overall platform reliability.

• **Rich Text for Blogs:** Blog posts now support full Markdown formatting, ensuring titles, subtitles, and emphasis are displayed beautifully.

release_notes:

release_notes:

label: Daily Update - Apr 27th

release_notes:

label: Daily Update - Nov 21st
release_notes:

release_notes:

• **Dashboard Updates**: Introduces a refreshed Professor Dashboard with improved table layouts, fixed-width columns, and a new renderer for clearer lesson content.

release_notes:

• **Online Grading Enhancements:** Enjoy a refreshed look and feel, including a new "Grade All Questions" option to speed up the assessment process.
• **Progress Tracking:** Stay informed with new statistics in your dashboard that track the number of graded questions versus total questions for every exam.
• **Exam Creation:** Added helpful context for AI Proctoring and Smart Randomization features, along with improved support for updating rubrics on existing submissions.
• **Performance & Stability:** Includes updates to score calculation accuracy, mobile guide localization, and general user interface improvements.

label: Daily Update - Nov 25th
release_notes:
• Improved the **Grade All Questions** feature with more accurate progress tracking and reliable completion handling.
• Redesigned the **Professor Dashboard** exam cards for a cleaner layout and better usability.
• Enhanced **Score Calculation** logic to ensure final exam grades precisely match the sum of individual answers.
• Updated **Student Status** indicators to verify they display correctly in all supported languages.
• **Backend improvements** to increase system stability and performance.

label: Daily Update - Nov 26th
release_notes:
• **Student Grades Portal:** A new dedicated view allows professors to track individual student performance across all shared courses and exams in one place.
• **Enhanced Analytics:** Quickly view grading progress with new interactive cards that display graded versus total students and questions for each exam.
• **Visual Score Summaries:** The student grades interface now features an improved layout with clear score visualizations and accessible academic integrity status.
• **User Interface Improvements:** Updated the layout with responsive panels and refined management tools for a smoother experience.
• **Performance & Stability:** Includes optimizations for faster data loading and improved reliability when viewing exam submissions.

label: Daily Update - Nov 27th
release_notes:
• **Redesigned Dashboard:** Experience a refreshed main view featuring a cleaner layout and smoother navigation for managing your daily tasks.

• **Course Files:** We’ve introduced a dedicated card on the dashboard, making it easier than ever to access and organize your course materials.

• **Assessments Tab:** The "Exams" section is now "Assessments" to better reflect the variety of grading activities available on the platform.

• **Infinite Scrolling:** Browsing through long lists of assessments is now seamless with our new infinite scroll support.

• **Stability Improvements:** We’ve resolved issues with language settings and applied general polish to the user interface for a more reliable experience.

label: Daily Update - Nov 29th
release_notes:
• **Easy Grade:** Introducing a new, seamless end-to-end workflow for faster exam grading.
• **Enhanced Regrading:** Added support for selectively regrading submissions directly within the Easy Grade interface.
• **Workflow Improvements:** Streamlined the review process to ensure a smoother experience when managing submissions.
• **Stability & Performance:** Includes backend optimizations and fixes to improve the reliability of exam queries.

label: Week 33 - Dec 1st to 7th
release_notes:
• **Decimal Grading Support:** You can now assign precise scores using decimal points in rubrics and grading inputs, allowing for more granular evaluation of student performance.
• **Enhanced AI Capabilities:** We’ve upgraded the core AI engine for improved grading accuracy and introduced a new "AI Decide" mode that automatically generates optimal lesson structures.
• **New Grading Workflows:** Introducing a dedicated "Individual Grading" page for streamlined batch processing and a new Mobile Grading Guide to help you grade effectively on any device.
• **Advanced Math Support:** Native LaTeX integration now allows for seamless rendering of complex mathematical equations in lessons and exams.
• **Improved Export Options:** PDF exports now feature higher-quality rendering for images and formatted content.
• **Expanded Localization:** Added comprehensive Spanish language support across the Easy Grade interface and Dashboard.
• **Performance Improvements:** Includes backend optimizations and stability fixes to ensure a smoother, faster experience.

label: Daily Update - Dec 7th
release_notes:
• **Flexible Student Management**: You can now manage student participation on a per-exam basis, allowing you to include or exclude specific students without altering the main course roster.
• **PDF Exam Support**: Added a new split-view interface for PDF submissions, enabling students and graders to view uploaded documents alongside question cards.
• **French Language Support**: The platform is now fully translated into French, covering the dashboard, exam creation tools, settings, and support chat.
• **Submission Controls**: Improved the reliability of deleting student submissions and resetting exam statuses.
• **Custom Branding**: Enhanced support for displaying partner-specific logos and branding elements within the dashboard.

label: Daily Update - Dec 8th
release_notes:
• **PDF Submissions**: You can now view and access original PDF submissions directly within the grading interface.
• **Enterprise Management**: Added the ability to edit student names inline directly from the Enterprise course view.
• **Localization**: Added French language support for student grades and chart components, along with improved translation consistency across the dashboard.
• **Performance**: Optimized application loading speeds and backend processing for faster grading results.

label: Daily Update - Dec 12th
release_notes:
• **New Community Forum**: Introduced a dedicated space for users to discuss topics, share insights, and connect with peers.
• **Visual Refresh**: Refined the design of dialogs and the EasyGrade selector with a modern color scheme and improved accessibility.
• **AI Engine Enhancements**: Upgraded the underlying AI models to provide more robust and reliable grading performance.
• **Dashboard Improvements**: Updated the main dashboard interface for a smoother user experience.
• **Bug Fixes**: Resolved an issue with grading schedules and applied general backend optimizations for better stability.

label: Daily Update - Dec 31st
release_notes:
• **Enhanced Security**: Implemented significant upgrades to data protection protocols for professor and administrator accounts.
• **Student Privacy**: Strengthened access controls to ensure student data remains strictly confidential and accessible only to authorized users.
• **Demo Exams**: Improved the reliability and performance of the sample exam generation tool.
• **Rubric Management**: Refined permission settings to ensure grading rubrics are accessed securely.
• **Performance Improvements**: Includes various backend optimizations and stability enhancements.

label: Daily Update - Jan 2nd
release_notes:
• **Interactive Demo Mode:** Experience the full ExamAI workflow—from question generation to AI grading and analytics—with a new built-in demonstration tool.
• **Enhanced Language Support:** AI grading now automatically adapts to the specific language settings defined in your exam preferences for more accurate, localized results.
• **Grading Reliability:** Implemented a new queuing system for PDF and Easy Grading batches to ensure smoother processing and improved stability during high-volume tasks.
• **Expanded Feedback View:** Grading feedback is no longer truncated, allowing you to view complete comments and summaries directly in the results interface.
• **Student Management:** Improved the accuracy of student lists within the grading tab to ensure all submissions are visible and properly tracked.
• **Performance Improvements:** Includes various backend optimizations to speed up grading progress updates and general application responsiveness.

label: Daily Update - Jan 13th
release_notes:
• **Turbo QR Grading:** Experience a significantly faster grading workflow with live scan progress, real-time page thumbnails, and optimized support for large PDF uploads.

• **Smart Page Detection:** Introduced pattern-based extrapolation to automatically identify student pages even when QR codes are partially obscured, along with new controls for manual page assignment.

• **Enterprise Management:** Administrators can now quickly copy signup links for inactive users directly from the user management table to streamline onboarding.

• **Student Organization:** Improved email handling logic ensures student records are matched and de-duplicated correctly, regardless of input capitalization.

• **Performance & Stability:** Enhanced backend reliability for grading pipelines, improved error recovery, and resolved visual glitches during page loading.

label: Daily Update - Jan 20th
release_notes:
• **Audio Notes:** You can now record, manage, and view lecture notes directly within the student and professor dashboards.
• **File Uploads:** Added support for uploading external audio files (MP3, WAV, M4A, and more) directly into the recording interface.
• **Enhanced Transcription:** Significantly improved AI processing for long lectures, now supporting recordings up to 3 hours with smarter, content-responsive note generation.
• **Interface Polish:** Refined the Dark Mode experience for recordings and improved the clarity of status notifications during the grading process.
• **Localization:** Expanded language support with new translations for the grading UI and audio features, including improved support for French.
• **Performance:** optimized background processing to ensure smoother handling of large media files.

label: Daily Update - Jan 29th
release_notes:
• **Enterprise Content Control:** Administrators can now manage and restrict student access to specific course materials directly from the dashboard.
• **Localization Support:** We’ve expanded our language options with new Portuguese translations for a better global experience.
• **Visual Enhancements:** The user interface has been polished to provide a cleaner, more intuitive experience.
• **Performance & Stability:** Includes under-the-hood improvements and foundational updates to ensure the app runs smoothly across all platforms.

label: Daily Update - Jan 30th
release_notes:
• **Score Consistency:** Unified numeric formatting across student and professor views to ensure grades are always displayed clearly with two decimal places.
• **Enterprise Insights:** Introduced a new Usage dashboard allowing administrators to view detailed grading logs and activity groups.
• **Internationalization:** Added multi-language support for the Enterprise Usage panel and content management notifications.
• **Stability & Performance:** Enhanced authentication flows and improved reliability when saving application themes and settings.
